Notes.Text:
This update for dom4j fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2018-1000632: Prevent XML injection vulnerability that allowed an
  attacker to tamper with XML documents (bsc#1105443)
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4

Vulnerabilities.Description: dom4j version prior to version 2.1.1 contains a CWE-91: XML Injection vulnerability in Class: Element. Methods: addElement, addAttribute that can result in an attacker tampering with XML documents through XML injection. This attack appear to be exploitable via an attacker specifying attributes or elements in the XML document. This vulnerability appears to have been fixed in 2.1.1 or later.

ProductID: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4:dom4j-1.6.1-8.3.8.1
